feed.title: MediaManager Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MediaManager: v1.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add notifications by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/17
  • Add notifications by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/18

Full Changelog: https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/compare/v1.2.4...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for MediaManager: v1.4.0
entry.content:
MediaManager v1.4.0

This release adds support for Usenet, more specifically Sabnzbd, it also adds support for configuration via a .toml config file. Also the documentation has been enhanced to make deployment easier.

BREAKING CHANGES

Configuration is now mainly via a .toml config file. See the documentation for more information.

PR's

  • Increase max access and refresh token length supported by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/36
  • fix initial migration by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/37
  • add healthcheck to postgres container in template docker-compose.yaml by @jimmyhiggs337 in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/31
  • push containers on PR's too by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/38
  • [WiP] Chore/improve dev experience by @JTCorrin in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/28
  • add sponsors to "about page" and README.md by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/45
  • Add usenet support by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/43
  • Add configuration via toml file and enhance documentation by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/48

New Contributors

  • @jimmyhiggs337 made their first contribution in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/31
  • @JTCorrin made their first contribution in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/28

Please consider supporting my work ❤️

  • https://buymeacoffee.com/maxdorninger
  • https://github.com/sponsors/maxdorninger

Full Changelog: https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for MediaManager: MediaManager v1.4.1 - Hotfix
entry.content:
Hotfix

  • 49

This version fixes the issue that setting config values with env variables makes the backend crash.

entry.title: New release for MediaManager: MediaManager v1.4.2 - Hotfix
entry.content:
Hotfix

  • 52

This version fixes the issue that alembic doesn't use the new config class and thus can't migrate the DB to the newest version.

MediaManager v1.4.0

This release adds support for Usenet, more specifically Sabnzbd, it also adds support for configuration via a .toml config file. Also the documentation has been enhanced to make deployment easier.

BREAKING CHANGES

Configuration is now mainly via a .toml config file. See the documentation for more information.

entry.title: New release for MediaManager: MediaManager v1.5.0
entry.content:
This release introduces support for Transmission. It also fixes several bugs.

Breaking Changes

You must add this section to your config file: ```toml

Transmission configuration

[torrents.transmission]
enabled = false
username = "admin"
password = "your_secure_password"
https_enabled = true
host = "transmission"
port = 9091
path = "/transmission/rpc"

```

Please consider supporting my work ❤️

  • https://buymeacoffee.com/maxdorninger
  • https://github.com/sponsors/maxdorninger

What's Changed

  • Hotfix: fix qbittorrent not working by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/53
  • Hotfix: fix downloads from Sabnzbd being in the wrong folders by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/54
  • Fix: Session cookie not being transmitted when using http by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/56
  • Fix: remove hardcoded colours from setting's dialogues by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/59
  • Add support for transmission by @maxdorninger in https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/pull/61

Full Changelog: https://github.com/maxdorninger/MediaManager/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.0
